channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins REST List Parameter Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins REST List Parameter Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-34196|2024-08-03T08:16:17.281Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20rest%20list%20parameter%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins REST List Parameter Plugin 1.5.2 and earlier does not escape the name and description of REST list parameters on views displaying parameters, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.
